entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
